mapper.select: select mem_num as memNum, mem_name as memName, mem_id as memId, mem_pw as memPw , mem_addr as memAddr, mem_detail_addr as memDetailAddr, mem_post as memPost , mem_phone_num as memPhoneNum, GENDER as gender, mem_register_date as memRegisterDate , mem_email as memEmail, mem_birth as memBirth from member where mem_id = #{memId}
